programme.title: Clinton in China, June 1998
programme.short_synopsis: President Clinton visits China, considering US - Chinese relations and Nixon's 1972 visit.
programme.medium_synopsis: President Clinton visits China and Alistair Cooke considers US - China relations, their economic balance, disagreement over Taiwan and the changes since Nixon's visit in 1972.
